1.text: But of the times and the seasons, brothers, you have no need that I write to you.

2.text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so comes as a thief in the night.

3.text: For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction comes on them, as travail on a woman with child; and they shall not escape.

4.text: But you, brothers, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.

5.text: You are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.

6.text: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.

7.text: For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.

8.text: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.

9.text: For God has not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,

10.text: Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.

11.text: Why comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also you do.

12.text: And we beseech you, brothers, to know them which labor among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;

13.text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their workâ€™s sake. And be at peace among yourselves.

14.text: Now we exhort you, brothers, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.

15.text: See that none render evil for evil to any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.

18.text: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.

21.text: Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.

22.text: Abstain from all appearance of evil.

23.text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless to the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

24.text: Faithful is he that calls you, who also will do it.

26.text: Greet all the brothers with an holy kiss.

27.text: I charge you by the Lord that this letter be read to all the holy brothers.

28.text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
